channel.title: Openstack on Deimosfr Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Openstack on Deimosfr Blog

item.title: OpenStack Summit in Paris on Monday!
item.description: OpenStack Summit will take place in Paris in 2 days! I’m excited to be able to participate. Big thanks to eNovance/RedHat for it! To know more about the event, please follow the link.

item.title: Openstack Meetup 9: Ceph, Swift and ZFS!
item.description: Do not miss OpenStack meetup event at eNovance headquarter! There will be big talks on: ZFS Ceph Swift You’ve understood, it’ storage related for OpenStack. Of course I’ll be there :-D. More informations are available here.

item.title: OpenStack: 7th Meetup, network oriented
item.description: The next OpenStack meetup will be next Wednesday in Paris! Don’t miss it, I’ll be there too! Talks are about: Neutron SDN controller and Linux kernel OpenStack + OpenContrail Datacenter Network Virtualization French foundation For more informations, follow the link.

item.title: OpenStack Meetup 6 on Thuesday
item.description: This meetup should be very interesting as it will talk about deployment for OpenStack. The speakers comes from eNovance and RedHat ! Talks will be very interesting. You can find more informations there: http://www.meetup.com/OpenStack-France/events/161704432/

item.title: OpenStack in action 4 ! I’ll be there :-)
item.description: As you may know, I’m working at eNovance and am happy to participate to an OpenStack in action session. This this the 4th edition and will be based in Paris. I’m currently working on Ceph and OpenStack for clients and this kind of events are important to be up to date on OpenStack. You can register here : https://www.eventbrite.com/e/openstack-in-action-4-tickets-7645801799

item.title: PackStack : quickly deploy OpenStack for production
item.description: Last week, I’ve assisted to a webinar organized by Puppet Labs. The talk was about PackStack which is a solution to deploy OpenStack in a production environment. How does PackStack works ? Some of you may tell me that DevStack do the same thing. But I warn once again about DevStack which is absolutely not build for production usages ! PackStack is a bundle of current modules for OpenStack available on Puppet Forge.

item.title: OpenStack : rejoignez le chan IRC !
item.description: Petite annonce pour vous dire que le channel IRC #openstack-fr sur freenode est ouvert et que si vous suivez OpenStack de prêt ou de loin, venez vous connecter ! Vous l’aurez compris, à la différence des autres, celui ci est en français.
